data.title: uArm: Put a Miniature Industrial Robot Arm on Your Desk by UFactory — Kickstarter
data.name: UFactory
data.description: uArm is an Arduino-powered desktop 4-axis parallel-mechanism robot arm, modeled after the ABB industrial PalletPack robot.

data.title: Robots, Drawing, and Engineering: An Online Course by NarwhalEdu — Kickstarter
data.name: NarwhalEdu
data.description: Online introduction to engineering course + sweet drawing robot arm kit. Starts Feb 2014, taking 100 students. engineering = creativity

data.title: FIRST Robotics Team 271: The Mechanical Marauders by FIRST Robotics Team 271 — Kickstarter
data.name: FIRST Robotics Team 271
data.description: FIRST Robotics Team 271 is Bay Shore High School's robotics team:  inspiring students in the fields of engineering and technology.
